attributes.review: Complete trash, phone is full of spam and adds. Wish I could give it a 0/10

attributes.review: because of this specific app I can no longer look at my microwave. this app has caused me to gain an irrational fear of exploding microwaves, and now I cant heat up my hot pockets. thanks trump. 😤
attributes.title: it’s a bad app

attributes.review: Worst app ever ! Don’t like it at all it’s terrible , horrible, and disgusting! It’s a waste of time and storage 👎!  Can’t believe the president would put an app like this on the App Store ! 🧚
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: Is Trump trying to hack the younger people’s iPhones to use censorship???? No President should allow his app to have terrible graphics like this! I am truly disgusted with not only this app but this president!!

attributes.review: The amount of glitches this app has omg!!!😕 and the app take days to be installed 😞 might as well just remove this app from the apple store
attributes.title: The App

attributes.review: Immediately after downloading the app, my phone burst into flames. Wasn’t even worth downloading as a joke.
attributes.title: Very disappointing

attributes.review: the whole thing disgusted me. did not run smoothly. felt like i was about to be raped by the man. gave me the worlds worst sunburn. fed me anchovies and this app is horrible. -everything/10
attributes.title: DONT GET IT

attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever tried to use. it’s impossible to navigate, and constantly sends countless notifications. 0/10 nobody should download
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: Don’t get this app, it’s the root of all evil. This man doesn’t know what’s good for America. DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP AND DONT FORGET TO LEAVE A REVIEW. Also I came here looking for my dog but I ended up finding my sister’s, friend’s, grandpa’s, brother’s, grandson’s, uncle’s fish

attributes.review: This app is awful.. I went into use it and it started glitching it messed my whole phone up. I had to go get my phone wiped.
